title: Hmangaih zual che ka duh
lyrics:
Hmangaih zual che ka duh,
Lalpa Isu;
Ka duhsam ber ni se,
Hmangaih zual che,
Hei hi ka dil fo vang,
Hmangaih zual deuh deuh hi,
Hmangaih zual che,
Aw, hmangaih che.

Lawmna leh thlamuanna,
Ka zawn thin kha,
I hnenah chuah ka hmu,
Lawmna kim chu.
Hei hi a ni fo vang,
Ka tawngtainate zawng;
Hmangaih zual che,
Aw, hmangaih che.

Hmangaih hla saktirtu
Lo ni sela,
Lungngaih hrehawmte pawh,
Ka thlang bawk ang.
An ri a mawi fo vang,
He hla an nawn chhung zawng;
Hmangaih zual che,
Aw hmangaih che.

Hei hian thinlung a hnem,
Hmangaih zual che;
Tih hlen theih hi ka ngen,
Thih ni thlengin.
Hei hian lo tawp sela,
Ka tawngtainate zawng,
Hmangaih zual che,
Aw, hmangaih che.
